"Did something happen?":
"...Your people made the DOLLS.
That's what you just said."

"So the whole reason so many people died...
The reason so many families were destroyed..."

"It was all just your little experiment that's been
going on since long before any of us were even born?"
"Let's listen to everything she has to say."
"We created the DOLLS and sent them down to Halpha."
"To prepare for the Day of Arrival."
